metadata.h1: Best Olive Garden Lunch Deals for 2025? See Menu!
metadata.description: Trying the Olive Garden Lunch Menu? Get the inside scoop on all the lunch-sized deals, prices, and hours for 2025. Don't miss out!

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: PSA: The Olive Garden lunch menu is the ultimate life hack! ðŸ™Œ You get their legendary Italian flavors in perfect portions that won't send you into a food coma. The unlimited Soup, Salad & Breadsticks combo is ICONIC, but don't sleep on the lunch-sized classics. Let's get into these deals! ðŸ”¥

data.title: Your Olive Garden Lunch Questions Answered! ðŸ’¡

items.question: What are Olive Gardenâ€™s lunch hours?
items.answer: The magic happens Monday through Friday until 3:00 PM! On weekends and holidays, it's the dinner menu all day, so plan accordingly.

items.question: Does Olive Garden have lunch specials?
items.answer: YES! And they are amazing. You can get lunch-sized versions of classics like Fettuccine Alfredo and Lasagna, and they all come with unlimited soup or salad and those famous breadsticks. It's the best deal in town! ðŸ¥–

items.question: Can I get the lunch menu on weekends?
items.answer: Sadly, no. The lunch-sized portions and prices are a weekday-only treat (Mon-Fri before 3 PM). Weekends are for going big with the dinner menu! ðŸ˜‰

items.question: What comes with the Unlimited Soup, Salad & Breadsticks lunch?
items.answer: It's exactly what it sounds like - pure bliss! You get unlimited servings of their fresh garden salad, your choice of homemade soups (like Zuppa Toscana or Pasta e Fagioli), and warm, garlicky breadsticks. You can switch soups with each refill!

items.question: Can I order the lunch specials for takeout?
items.answer: Yes, you can! Olive Garden offers their lunch specials for takeout, so you can enjoy a delicious and affordable Italian lunch at your desk or at home. Just be aware that the 'unlimited' part of the soup, salad, and breadsticks deal doesn't apply to takeout orders.
